statements: UPDATE social_media_data SET likes_count = 100 WHERE user_id = 1
UPDATE social_media_data SET comments_count = 50, post_content = 'Updated post content' WHERE user_id = 2
UPDATE social_media_data SET post_content = 'Updated post content', comments_count = 10 WHERE user_id = 1 AND post_date = '2022-01-01'
UPDATE social_media_data SET likes_count = 20, post_content = 'New post content' WHERE user_id = 2 AND post_date = '2022-02-15'

UPDATE tweets SET likes=50, retweets=25 WHERE tweet_id=201
UPDATE customers SET name='Alice', age=30 WHERE customer_id=1;
